## 资质Qualfications

![fig_02196](https://p9-flow-imagex-sign.byteimg.com/ocean-cloud-tos/pdf/b5404670b8adfea36bcb8e2b632ca25b_2_1200.jpg~tplv-a9rns2rl98-resize-crop:651:75:853:122:202:47.jpeg?rk3s=1567c5c4&x-expires=1777467473&x-signature=1YB2mB53CsPo9p4UpFCVVn46nqs%3D) 
友福同享(深圳)智能科技有限公司是一家以人工智能为核心的高科技公司,致力于 提升人类生命质量。我们拥有多项自主知识产权,包括在人工智能、社群和元宇宙等 领域的核心发明专利。公司的AIGS(Artificial Intelligence Generated Service)生成 式系统服务方案在AI生命科学领域具有创新性和颠覆性,使我们在全球范围内保持领 先地位。公司持续推出其围绕AI核心服务的健康饮食及智能系列产品。 
友福同享团队汇集了来自华为、腾讯、IBM、百度、京东、沃尔玛等公司的资深专 家,以及来自清华大学、中科院、中山大学、天津大学、UC Berkeley、康奈尔大学 等顶尖学府的学者。此外,团队中还有半导体芯片架构师、工程院院士、生物医学工 程博士后、联合国数字安全专家及中国电子商会的AI技术专家,具有平均20年以上的 行业经验。 
![fig_09399](https://p3-flow-imagex-sign.byteimg.com/ocean-cloud-tos/pdf/b5404670b8adfea36bcb8e2b632ca25b_2_1200.jpg~tplv-a9rns2rl98-resize-crop:642:502:1200:851:558:349.jpeg?rk3s=1567c5c4&x-expires=1777467473&x-signature=f0THlrbXiBpE%2BeEAGY%2ByuQPaD%2F8%3D)
# 核心业务·友福智能健康 CORE BUSINESS: AI WELLNESS SHARING 
无需药物和器械 No need for Easy to master medication or equipment 
![fig_54884](https://p3-flow-imagex-sign.byteimg.com/ocean-cloud-tos/pdf/b5404670b8adfea36bcb8e2b632ca25b_3_1200.jpg~tplv-a9rns2rl98-resize-crop:1038:125:1098:185:60:60.jpeg?rk3s=1567c5c4&x-expires=1777467473&x-signature=CY%2Fclhfd1n7AqU00fOnxPUk9fCo%3D) 
## 我们的优势 OUR ADVANTAGES 
友福同享以独有的革命性智能健康解决方案:AIGS生成式系统服务方案,站在全球创新的 前沿,以革命性的姿态引领生命科学领域的发展。友福同享掌握一系列核心知识产权以及发 明专利,其卓越的颠覆性正逐步重塑生命健康体系。友福智能健康以其中西结合,非医疗、 非药物的独特方式,为全球亚健康用户带来显著的效果。 AI Sharing offers a unigue,revolutionary smart heath solutiort the AIS system service programs, le aing the forefront of qlobal innovation and driving the developmert of the life soiences. Al Sharing holds a series of core Shdi e ng significant results to global sub-healthy users. 
## 个性化定制 CUSTOMIZED PERSONALIZATION 
基于人工智能核心算法,定制私人健康方案,解决人体亚健康问题。 Using core Al algorithms to create personalized health plans addressing sub-health issues. 
![fig_93756](https://p3-flow-imagex-sign.byteimg.com/ocean-cloud-tos/pdf/b5404670b8adfea36bcb8e2b632ca25b_3_1200.jpg~tplv-a9rns2rl98-resize-crop:52:648:80:679:28:31.jpeg?rk3s=1567c5c4&x-expires=1777467473&x-signature=WHsXzHSt%2BW4qxnt%2BfeuVe%2BDGX7A%3D) 
人工智能 Artifial Intelligence 
依据全球客户所在地的体检报告,为每个客 户提供量身定制的个性化健康服务方案。 Based on Healh reports from austomers worldwide. providing tailor-made personalized health service programs for each client. 
![fig_08673](https://p9-flow-imagex-sign.byteimg.com/ocean-cloud-tos/pdf/b5404670b8adfea36bcb8e2b632ca25b_3_1200.jpg~tplv-a9rns2rl98-resize-crop:331:648:359:679:28:31.jpeg?rk3s=1567c5c4&x-expires=1777467473&x-signature=MipLOwncPtr6e0PbZz0HV3dg6rU%3D) 
人工服务 Human Services 
提供精准营养及饮食指导、情感关怀、 心理疏导,教练客服线上线下全程指导 服务。 
Providing dietary nutrtion guidance,emotional care.psychological counseling, and complete online customer ser vice support throughout the process. 
## 一站式解决方案 IONE-STOP SOLUTION 
![fig_00391](https://p9-flow-imagex-sign.byteimg.com/ocean-cloud-tos/pdf/b5404670b8adfea36bcb8e2b632ca25b_3_1200.jpg~tplv-a9rns2rl98-resize-crop:672:126:732:185:60:59.jpeg?rk3s=1567c5c4&x-expires=1777467473&x-signature=53brwsHf7gIiXPCi6AadSipAsRU%3D)

友福生态-友福智能设备 AI SHARING ECOSYSTEM - AI DEVICE SHARING 
友福智能设备是基于人工智能和大数据技术开发 的智能产品,通过收集和分析用户的健康数据, 为用户提供精准的健康管理解决方案。通过一系 列智能设备,如智能手环,我们能够实时监测用 户的生理指标,从心率、睡眠质量到活动水平, 全面捕捉健康数据。 
AI Device Sharing comprises smart products developed using Al and big data technologies that collect and analyze uoerio hs ithdaa fe nf arne ah hnynn bands,it can monitor users physiological indicators in real-time, capturing comprehensive health data from heart rate and sleep quality to activity levels. 
这些数据通过我们的大数据分析模型进行处理, 使我们能够洞察用户的健康状况,并依此提出个 性化的改善建议。例如,对于遭受失眠问题的用 户,我们的可以分析用户其睡眠模式,结合日常 活动数据,制定科学的干预措施和改善方案。 This data is processed through our big data analysis model. oneb ingsun t n nnns ishsn nn. for users suffering from insomnia,our system can analyze their sleep patterns combined with daily activity data to devise scientific intervention measures and improvement plans. 
友福智能设备的核心优势在于其强大的数据处理 能力和精确的健康分析,使我们能够在用户健康 管理中发挥关键作用。通过持续的数据监测和深 入的分析,帮助每一位用户优化其健康生活方 式,提升生活质量。 
The core strength of AI Device Sharing lies in its robust data processing capability and precise health analysis. playing a key role in users' health management. Through continuous data monitoring and det ailed analysis, it helps each user optimize their health lifestyle and enhance their quality of life.

## 至今,友福活动的总参与人次9400+ To date, the total paricipatin in haine vens ha reched over 9400 
友福活动不仅为创业者提供了一个个交流互动的宝贵空间,更是一个个促进知识共享、资源 对接的桥梁。创业者们可以在这里结识志同道合的伙伴,建立深厚的联系,并互相分享宝贵 的创业经验。同时,经验丰富的创业家和专业人士也会积极参与,分享他们的知识和见解。 帮助新创业者规避风险,发现潜在的合作机会,激发创新的灵感,共同探索市场趋势。 Al Events Sharing is not just a space for entrepreneurs to freely interact,but also a bridge that fosters knowledge sharing and resource connections. Entrepreneurs here can meet like-minded partners,build strong connections, and share valuable entrepreneurial experiences.At the same time,experienced entrepreneurs and professionals actively participate,sharing their knowledge and insights to help entrepreneurs mitigate risks,discover potential collab or ative opportunities, inspire innovative ideas, and collectively explore market trends. 
友福生态-友福手书 PROSHARE ECOLOGY - PROSHARE HAND BOOK 
友福手书致力于培养阅读作为一种生活方式的习惯,我们认为阅读习惯的重要性超过了书 本知识的学习。在信息爆炸的当代社会中,挑选合适的书籍变得愈发困难,因此我们每月 精心挑选并推荐一本优质书籍,帮助用户建立长期且稳定的阅读习惯。我们的目标是使阅 读成为每个人日常生活的一部分,在阅读中找到属于自己的节奏和乐趣。 AI Reading Sharing is dedicated to fostering the habit of reading as a lifestyle.Wwe believe the importance of reading habits surpasses the learning of book knowledge.In today's information-saturated society. selecting suitable books is increasingly challenging. Ther efore,we carefully select and recommend one quality book each month to help users establish a long-term and stable reading habit.Our goal is to make reading a part of everyone's daily life,helping individuals find their own pace and enjoyment in reading.
